httpserver.serve_content('Not Found', 404)
http_validator = HttpValidation.get(httpserver.url).expect_status_codes([200])
email_settings = {'email_type': 'test_alert', 'body': 'body test', 'sender':
    {'real_name': 'Alarmageddon Monitor', 'address':
    'noreply@alarmageddon.com'}, 'recipients': [{'real_name':
    'Test Recipient', 'address': 'testrecipient@alarmageddon.com'}]}
with pytest.raises(KeyError):
    emailer.enrich(http_validator, email_settings)
